title: Marsden
name: Standedge Tunnel boat trip
price: Adults (£4.50); Seniors (60+) & Students (£4); Child 5–15 yrs (£3.50); 4 & under (Free); Family Ticket (£14)
content: Hourly 30-minute trips available; 2-hour through trips to [[Diggle]] and back are available every other Saturday during summer.
